name: Arroyo de la Gran Cascada Canyon
description:
Introduction

This canyon has not been explored. From satellite, it looks to have a very large waterfall - 50 meters or more?

Approach

Probably best to park at the parking area for El Mamey Canyon, and walk over from there.

Descent

Exit

Red tape

No red tape. Locals very friendly.

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
